## CharityFormulas.terrorGain() method

Calculate terror gained per tick.

**Signature:**

```typescript
terrorGain(charity: CharityGenInfo, member: CharityVolunteerInfo, task: CharityTaskStats): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  charity | [CharityGenInfo](./bitburner.charitygeninfo.md) | Charity info |
|  member | [CharityVolunteerInfo](./bitburner.charityvolunteerinfo.md) | Volunteer info |
|  task | [CharityTaskStats](./bitburner.charitytaskstats.md) | Task info |

**Returns:**

number

The calculated money gained.
